text: qalt thamud lnbyha salh: ma 'ant 'iilaa min aladhin suhru sihrana kthyrana, hataa ghalab alsihr ealaa eqlk. ma 'ant 'iilaa fard mumathil lana fi albashariat min bani adm, fkyf ttmyz ealayna balrsal? fat bihujat wadihatan tadulu ealaa thubut rsaltk, 'iin kunt sadqana fi dewak 'ana allah arslk 'ilyna
